name: Marksman

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in the Arena by 32%.

skills.name: Venom Arrow
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 5% [Poison] debuff for 1 turn if the attack is critical. Has a 15% chance of granting an Extra Turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Impressive Shot
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Fills the Turn Meter of all allies by 20%. Has an extra 15% chance of inflicting a critical hit.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Thorns
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 4 times at random. Each hit has a 25% chance to Ignore DEF.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +15%
Lvl. 3 Damage +15%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

faction.name: High Elves
faction.default_description: High Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends
